hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT EOFO.EOFO_ID FEE_ID, EOFO.ORG_ID ORG_ID,
EOFO.EOFO_RP_FLAG_CODE RP_FLAG_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_RP_FLAG_NAME RP_FLAG_NAME,
EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_CODE PARTY_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_NAME PARTY_NAME,
EOFO.EOFO_FEE_CODE FEE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_NAME FEE_NAME,
EOFO.EOFO_FEE_TYPE_CODE FEE_TYPE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_TYPE_NAME FEE_TYPE_NAME,
EOFO.EOFO_CURRENCY CURRENCY,
EOFO.EOFO_PRE_AMOUNT PRE_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_WAY FEE_WAY,
EOFO.EOFO_UNIT_PRICE UNIT_PRICE, EOFO.EOFO_RP_AMOUNT RP_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_QUANTITY QUANTITY, EOFO.EOFO_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, EOFO.CREATOR CREATOR, EOFO.CREATE_TIME CREATE_TIME, EOFO.MODIFIER MODIFIER, EOFO.MODIFY_TIME MODIFY_TIME, EOFO.REC_VER REC_VER, EOFO.REC_STATUS REC_STATUS, EOFO.PM_CODE PM_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_EORE_CODE EORE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_EORE_NAME EORE_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_SOURCE_CODE SOURCE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_SOURCE_NAME SOURCE_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_SUBMIT_STATUS_CODE SUBMIT_STATUS_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_SUBMIT_STATUS_NAME SUBMIT_STATUS_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_NAME COMFIRM_STATUS_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_IS_CASH IS_CASH, EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_TYPE_CODE PARTY_TYPE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_TYPE_NAME PARTY_TYPE_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_RATE RATE, EOFO.EOFO_TOTAL_AMOUNT TOTAL_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_BILL IS_HAVE_BILL, EOFO.EOFO_BILL_AMOUNT BILL_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_ROUND_TYPE_CODE ROUND_TYPE_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_ROUND_TYPE_NAME ROUND_TYPE_NAME, EOFO.EOFO_BILL_NO BILL_NO, EOFO.EOFO_REMARK REMARK, EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF, EOFO.EOFO_CHARGEOFF_AMOUNT CHARGEOFF_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_IS_RECONCILIATION IS_RECONCILIATION, EOFO.EOFO_RECONCILIATION_DATE RECONCILIATION_DATE, EOFO.EOFO_INVOICE_DATE INVOICE_DATE, EOFO.EOFO_CHARGEOFF_DATE CHARGEOFF_DATE
FROM EO_FEE_MANAGEMENT_ORDER EOFO WHERE 1=1 << AND EOFO.ORG_ID=:orgId>> << AND EOFO.EOFO_ORDER_NO LIKE :orderNo>>
